features: Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Lemon Verbena air freshener spray is made with essential oils and other thoughtfully chosen ingredients, and gives your home instant freshening between cleaning days
Delivered in a non-aerosol spray to quickly freshen any room
Mrs. Meyer's products are made with cruelty-free formulas and are Leaping Bunny certified
Garden-inspired Lemon Verbena has a mild citrus air freshening scent that is light and refreshing
Mrs. Meyer's air freshener for home has thoughtfully chosen ingredients and is made without propellants, phthalates, parabens, or artificial colors
body.description: Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Room Fresheners are specifically made to quickly freshen any room, while also providing a special, singular scent for your home. Lemon Verbena scented room freshener has a light, refreshingly mild citrus fragrance. This tender herb blossoms in early summer and smells bright and new through and through. The non-aerosol bottle quickly freshens any room for instant fragrance.This room freshener is made with essential oils and other thoughtfully chosen ingredients. Perfect for when you need to add a little garden-inspired fragrance to your home between cleaning days. Made without propellants, phthalates, parabens, or artificial colors - and of course, always a cruelty free formula room air freshener. Bottles (less trigger) made with at least 30% post-consumer plastic. Also available in other garden-inspired scents and products such as candles, laundry detergent, dish packs, and so much more!. Mrs. Meyer's - Rooted in Goodness.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Making The World a More Compassionate Place One Garden At A Time Mrs. Meyer’s Clean Day products are inspired by the garden, which is why we’re inspired to plant flowers, plants and trees. At Mrs. Meyer’s, we have a passion for the environment. We also know the importance of being a good neighbor in our home, our community and our world. That’s why we’ve made a commitment to improving the earth one flower, plant and tree at a time through our campaigns, partnerships, volunteering efforts and donations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for bathrooms
reviews.reviewText: Great smell works well covering up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the lemon scent.
reviews.reviewText: Fresh lemon scent. Not overbearing. Would like for the air freshener to be in a more decorative bottle. We don’t have much company, so for us it works .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Third of product order leaked out. Fix the caps or offer a refill option without a trigger.
reviews.reviewText: Love Mrs Meyer's products. Great scent that isn't chemically. Unfortunately, I won't order again via Amazon. One bottle was completely empty from a loose cap during shipping. Lack of attention from Amazon driver too. It had to be noticeable when left at the door; potent smell and wet box. Dissappointed no refunds or exchanges.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This IS a good product. The lemon scent is VERY POWERFUL!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best scents ever
reviews.reviewText: These are strong and last long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST Air Freshener.
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately the fragrance doesn't last. Best Fragrance Ever. I'm trying the others to see if they would last longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars arrived leaking yet again
reviews.reviewText: For the third time it arrived damaged and leaking. This time the pump tops were loose. What gives?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Where's the lemon verbena?
reviews.reviewText: This product went straight to the trash - after confirming that I didn't need to return it. The outer box had no damage, other than being wet from the contents. The inner packaging was soaked, because one of the bottles didn't have the lid screwed on at all. I received a refund and instructions to dispose of it. However, more pertinent to the item itself... it STUNK. I don't see where this is 'lemon verbena' at all. It reeked horrifically of cheap perfume/detergent, the kind that gags you as you pass the detergent aisle at the supermarket, with no lemon verbena scent at all. It does get credit for longevity, though. I had to scour my hands for almost half an hour with lemon juice, vinegar, and everything else I could find to get the stench out of them. It's still lingering in the house. I pity the delivery driver who had that in their truck...
